Key Match Events: The New Orleans Pelicans lost another close home game, this time to the Los Angeles Clippers 116-113 on Monday night.
Post-Match Reflections: Dejounte Murray said 'No excuses', addressing his health during the team's losing streak.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Pelicans had their chances late, but turnovers and missed shots were their undoing against the Clippers.
Dejounte Murray finished with 13 points, 10 rebounds, eight assists, and six steals.
Others: The Pelicans are without Zion Williamson, Brandon Ingram, and Jose Alvarado, and guys like Murray, Trey Murphy III, and Herb Jones have already missed significant time this season.
